Reviews.Title: LIARS!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I paid $90 for a supposedly "Brand new Blackberry Curve" When my first phone arrived I could not even activate it with sprint as it said it was currently activated with another account...hmm NOT BRAND NEW! Then they sent me a 2nd phone saying that it was human error at their end, well the 2nd phone still was NOT brand new, I was on the phone with Sprint for 2 hours trying to get the web browser to work and they said the phone was tampered with and could not get a browser! VERY frustrating when I should/could have just gone to the sprint website and order a clearly stated refurbished phone and know I have all the features the phone should include.  Be wary of this sham.

Reviews.Title: Perfection!
Reviews.Author: CLG33
Reviews.Content: I had this same exact phone for almost 2 years and the phone started to act funny, and lose a charge very quickly. I thought it was the battery so I bought a new one, it was not the battery, the phone was simply worn out. I went to Sprint to try and upgrade but my contract still had 4 more months so if I wanted to get the same phone it would cost me $154 PLUS an additional 2 years on my contract! Outragous! I found this phone here and was afraid that it was too good to be true. When I received the phone I was very surprised that it was in fact brand new, it even came in a Sprint box. I am so pleased with my purchase, I will never purchase another cell from Sprint again. No more contracts for me!!!

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: D Hager "Mick Hager"
Reviews.Content: Phone was USED and was sold as NEW!  LIE! LIE! LIE! LIE!Phone had another number and account programmed in which means it was used and sold as new.  Vendor admitted openly that they were unsure if phones sent out were new or not.  Filed dispute with credit company--will take legal action if necessary.DON'T BUY THIS PHONE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: For an old wirelesses plan
Reviews.Author: Ta Hover
Reviews.Content: got ruined very quickly its probably an off brand from china. i wish blackberry sold it directly the originla wasnt bed

Reviews.Title: Not a quality product.
Reviews.Author: nancy mullinax
Reviews.Content: I actually only used it for a few days before I had to replace it.  The quality wasn't at all what I expected after reading the description.

Reviews.Title: Super fast
Reviews.Author: Ashley Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I got this phone super fast. It was exactly what I thought it would be. It's a great addition. Love it.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: Monica Willis
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone and it served it purpose until my son decided to upgrade to a newer phone.  Now outdated.

Reviews.Title: Still a great phone
Reviews.Author: Ben M. Evardome "Ben Evardome"
Reviews.Content: For an older phone, this cell phone works great. The keyboard still works great, the ball works great, the phone quality is still superb. For 30 dollars, you still really get what you pay for. The product was also mailed promptly and in great quality when shipped, no problems here.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!
Reviews.Author: Juan C. Ducca "JC"
Reviews.Content: Order arrived ahead of time.The phone was in very good condition as promised.Flashed RIM Ver. 4.5 for Sprint Blackberry and is working great.Thanks!Juan Carlos

Reviews.Title: Buy a brand new one
Reviews.Author: Mark Demon
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of this blackberry phone ,one is used and the other three are remanufactured,the use one still works been using it for almost a year,the remanufactured ones are all dead in less than two months,have so many issues before finally went dead,remanufactured ones are wortless,they only give you 30 days warranty...
